default.shortDescription: Add additional properties to the profile card
descriptionParagraphs: On the profile card in Microsoft 365, you can find information about users that is stored and maintained by your organization, for example Job title or Office location.
Use the profileCardProperty resource to show additional properties from Azure AD on profile cards for an organization
